GapFillDragDrop.Title: Wordspot: go
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose an answer and drag it to the correct space.

Content.Question:
1. I usually walk to work but I go home by bus.
2. Would you like to go for a coffee at Zero’s Café?
3. I’m going shopping to look for a present for Liz’s birthday.
4. Chrissy was in a car accident and she’s gone to hospital. She’ll be there for a couple of days.
5. My hair started going grey when I was forty.
6. The bomb went off at three o’clock in the afternoon.
7. You look tired. What time did you go to bed last night?
8. Uma is very fit. She goes for a run every morning before breakfast.
9. Go away! I’m trying to watch this programme.
10. Don’t stop. Go on. I’m listening.
11. We went on holiday to the South of France. The beaches were brilliant!
12. Bill went mad when Vicky broke his MP3 player.
